Text: Plz keep uploading these! Thanks for being so consistent in uploading 1080p DD5.1 versions. Looks and sounds great on our 47" LED TV. Much superior to the 720p. We seed at least twice or more.
Pretty damn close. Their source must of made a mistake in transcoding. Still looks good on my set and PC.
